casebody.data:
Harold H. Smith, an Infant, by William Lord, His Guardian ad Litem, Respondent, v. Erie Railroad Company, Appellant.

Judgment and order unanimously affirmed on reargument, with costs. (See 176 App. Div. 937.) No opinion. Present — Jenks, P. J., Thomas, Stapleton, Putnam and Blackmar, JJ.
